post.text: Thank you to my amazing supporters outside of Trump Tower this afternoon. #ImWithYou

comment.author: Allison
comment.text: When Trump wins this election, it'll only prove that Trump is people 's choice & hope...sorry the corruptive establishment. The man plans his course, but God directs his steps

replies.author: Lasinda
replies.text: Well said, Allison! God Bless You!

replies.author: Shaelyn
replies.text: I think you can literally say anything and people will still agree with you . Hilarious.. God must direct all the candidates steps apparently ðŸ˜‚
